decisions.name: dcn_Potential_Billing_Account_Contact_Match
decisions.label: dcn Potential Billing Account Contact Match?

Flow.description: 06-07May23 - CC(SDA) - Adjust to handle not selecting reps in assingee subflow for APAC launch 03May23 - CC(SDA) - update to pass message, escape single quotes in SOQL 01May23 - CC(SDA) - Change routing based on agency vs. customer referral 17Apr23 - CC(SDA) - final updates for pilot testing 4/12 - PJ Update Hyperlink for screen lead form 12/20-require country code Updated with UAT asks / bug fixes; removed unused elements. Run in system context, API v55 Mike - Removed Phone from "Any Required fields null?" Decision element

formulas.name: calcAccountSOQL
formulas.expression: {!txtAccountSOQL}+" Customer_TYpe__c <> 'Former Customer' AND (Name LIKE'%" + SUBSTITUTE({!varLeadRec_In.Company},"'","\'")+ "%' OR Domain__c = '" + {!calcAccountDomain}+ "' OR Name = '" + {!calcAccountDomain}+ "' OR Name = '" + {!Website} + "' OR Name = '" + {!calcAccountDomainName} + "' OR Name = '" + {!calcEmailDomainName} + "'" + IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!Agency_Name})), " OR (Name LIKE '%" + {!Agency_Name} + "%' AND RecordType.Name = 'Agency')" ,'') + IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!Parent_Organization_for_Agency}))," OR (Name LIKE '%" + {!Parent_Organization_for_Agency}+"%' AND RecordType.Name = 'Agency')",'') + ") ORDER BY LastModifiedDate DESC"

formulas.name: calcAccountTaskSOQL
formulas.expression: {!txtTaskBaseSOQL}+" (CompletedDateTime >= " +TEXT({!calcTodayQueryValue})+"T00:00:00z OR ActivityDate >= "+TEXT({!calcTodayQueryValue})+") AND AccountId IN (" + {!varTaskSQOLId}+ ") ORDER BY CompletedDateTime DESC"

formulas.name: calcBillingContactSOQL
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Name, Customer_Type__c, ORganization_Type__C, Billing_Contact__r.LastName, Billing_Contact__r.FirstName, Billing_Contact__r.Email FROM Account WHERE (Billing_Contact_Domain_Name__c = '"+{!calcEmailDomain}+"' OR Billing_Contact_Domain_Name__c = '" +{!calcAccountDomain} +"')"

formulas.name: calcContactAccountSOQL
formulas.expression: "SELECT LastName, FirstName, Email, Phone FROM Contact WHERE ((LastName LIKE '%" + SUBSTITUTE({!varLeadRec_In.LastName},"'","\'")+"%' AND FirstName LIKE '%" + SUBSTITUTE({!varLeadRec_In.FirstName},"'","\'")+"%') OR Email LIKE '%" + {!varLeadRec_In.Email} + "%') AND Id IN (SELECT ContactId FROM AccountContactRelation WHERE AccountId = '" + {!recAccountRec.Id} + "')"

formulas.name: calcContactSOQL
formulas.expression: "SELECT FirstName, LastName, Email, Account.Name FROM Contact WHERE (FirstName = '"+ SUBSTITUTE({!varLeadRec_In.FirstName},"'","\'")+"' AND LastName = '"+SUBSTITUTE({!varLeadRec_In.LastName},"'","\'")+"')"+IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!varLeadRec_In.Email}))," OR Email = '"+{!varLeadRec_In.Email}+"'","")

formulas.name: calcFPIndicators
formulas.expression:
IF({!FP_HostingWith},"Current Provider: "+{!varCurrentProvider}+"
","")+IF({!FP_NumEmps},"Employee Count: " +TEXT({!varEmployees})+"
","")+IF({!FP_NumEmpsIndustry},"Employee + Industry: "+TEXT({!varEmployees})+" / "+{!varPickIndustry}+"
","")+IF({!FP_QualifiedPlan},"Qualified Plan: " + {!varQualifiedPlan}+"
","")+IF({!FP_Revenue},"Revenue: "+{!varCompanyRevenueRange}+"
","")+IF({!FP_Visitors},"Monthly Traffic: " + {!varMonthlyTraffic}+"
","")+IF({!VC_Funded},"VC Funded: "+"YES"+"
","")+IF({!Price_Qualified},"Price Qualified: "+"YES"+"
","")

formulas.name: calcOpptyTaskSOQL
formulas.expression: {!txtTaskBaseSOQL}+" CreatedDate >= "+TEXT({!calcTodayQueryValue})+"T00:00:00z AND WhatId IN (SELECT Id FROM Opportunity WHERE AccountId IN (" + {!varTaskSQOLId}+ "))"

formulas.name: calcPassType
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS(TEXT({!varLeadRec_In.LeadSource}), "Proactive"),"Proactive", IF(AND( OR({!FP_HostingWith},{!FP_NumEmps},{!FP_NumEmpsIndustry},{!FP_Revenue},{!FP_Visitors},{!FP_NumWebSites},{!VC_Funded}), CONTAINS(TEXT({!varLeadRec_In.Qualified_Plan__c}),"Scale"),NOT({!Price_Qualified})),"Fast Pass", IF(AND(NOT( OR({!FP_HostingWith},{!FP_NumEmps},{!FP_NumEmpsIndustry},{!FP_Revenue},{!FP_Visitors},{!FP_NumWebSites},{!VC_Funded})), CONTAINS(TEXT({!varLeadRec_In.Qualified_Plan__c}),"Scale"),{!Price_Qualified}),"Soft Pass", IF(OR({!FP_HostingWith},{!FP_NumEmps},{!FP_NumEmpsIndustry},{!FP_Revenue},{!FP_Visitors},{!FP_NumWebSites},{!VC_Funded}), "Fast Pass","Soft Pass"))))

formulas.name: calcRelatedAccountsSOQL
formulas.expression: "SELECT AccountId, Account_Name__c, IsDirect, IsActive, StartDate, EndDate, Roles FROM AccountContactRelation WHERE ContactId = '"+{!recContactFound.Id}+"'"

formulas.name: calcSalesTeamSOQL
formulas.expression: "select Id, Name, Agency__c, Employees_Agency__c, Employees_Agency_High__c, Employees_Brand__c, Employees_Brand_High__c, WPE_Pure_MRR__c from Sales_Pass_Team__c WHERE Region__c = '"+{!varLeadRec_In.Project_Geo_new__c} + "' AND ((Product_Interest__c = '" + TEXT({!varLeadRec_In.Product_Interest__c})+"' AND Use_Product_Interest__c = true) OR Product_Interest__c = '') AND ((Segment__c = '" + {!calcSegment} + "' AND Use_Segment__c = true) OR Segment__c = '') AND " +IF({!varLeadRec_In.APP_Interest__c},"APP_Interest__c = true","(ACQ_Team__c = " + IF({!calcIsACQ},"true","false") + " AND APP_Interest__c = false)") + IF({!Is_Agency}," AND Agency__c = true",'' ) + IF(NOT({!Is_Agency})," AND Brand__c = true",'') + IF({!Is_Agency}, " AND ((Employees_Agency__c <= "+TEXT({!varEmployees})+ " OR Employees_Agency__c = null) AND (Employees_Agency_High__c >= "+TEXT({!varEmployees}) +" OR Employees_Agency_High__c = 0 OR Employees_Agency_High__c = null))", " AND ((Employees_Brand__c <= "+TEXT({!varEmployees})+ " OR Employees_Brand__c = null) AND (Employees_Brand_High__c >= "+TEXT({!varEmployees}) +" OR Employees_Brand_High__c = 0 OR Employees_Brand_High__c = null))") + " AND Id IN (SELECT Sales_Pass_Team__c FROM Sales_Pass_Type__c WHERE Pass_Type__c = '"+{!calcPassType} + "')"

formulas.name: calcSalesTeamSOQL2
formulas.expression: "select Id, Name, Agency__c, Employees_Agency__c, Employees_Agency_High__c, Employees_Brand__c, Employees_Brand_High__c, WPE_Pure_MRR__c from Sales_Pass_Team__c WHERE Region__c = '"+{!varLeadRec_In.Project_Geo_new__c} + "' AND ((Product_Interest__c = '" + TEXT({!varLeadRec_In.Product_Interest__c})+"' AND Use_Product_Interest__c = true) OR Product_Interest__c = '') AND ((Segment__c = '" + {!calcSegment} + "' AND Use_Segment__c = true) OR Segment__c = '') AND " +IF({!varLeadRec_In.APP_Interest__c},"APP_Interest__c = true","(ACQ_Team__c = " + IF({!calcIsACQ},"true","false") + " AND APP_Interest__c = false)") + IF({!Is_Agency}," AND Agency__c = true",'' ) + IF(NOT({!Is_Agency})," AND Brand__c = true",'') + IF({!Is_Agency}, " AND ((Employees_Agency__c <= "+TEXT({!varEmployees})+ " OR Employees_Agency__c = null) AND (Employees_Agency_High__c >= "+TEXT({!varEmployees}) +" OR Employees_Agency_High__c = 0 OR Employees_Agency_High__c = null))", " AND ((Employees_Brand__c <= "+TEXT({!varEmployees})+ " OR Employees_Brand__c = null) AND (Employees_Brand_High__c >= "+TEXT({!varEmployees}) +" OR Employees_Brand_High__c = 0 OR Employees_Brand_High__c = null))") + " AND Count_of_Pass_Types__c = 0"

formulas.name: calcScrubMessage
formulas.expression: IF(ISNULL({!recContactFound.Id}),"ACCOUNT IDENTIFIED / CREATE NEW CONTACT","ACCOUNT IDENTIFIED / CONVERT LEAD TO CONTACT")

Flow.label: Lead - Scrub 2.0
